## Renewable Energy

Today's renewable energy industry is a complex and evolving landscape of
growth and opportunity. Companies active in this sector face a range of
financial, tax, and audit issues that can be best addressed by a firm with
dedicated expertise in renewables. CohnReznick's Renewable Energy Industry
Practice can help your business move forward by proactively addressing even
your most complicated challenges and needs.

Contact us

##  

## Comprehensive services for renewable energy businesses

Our integrated team is fully engaged in the industry across all the major
energy segments, delivering holistic solutions to complex problems facing
renewable energy participants.

### **Broad sector expertise**

  

Our more than 100 clients across the renewable energy spectrum include
independent power producers, developers, EPCs, utilities, tax equity
investors, and infrastructure and private equity funds.

### **An expert in tax credit advisory**

  

Following extensive due diligence, we structure deals and fulfill the
accounting, tax, and financial reporting requirements needed to support tax
equity investing lenders, private equity, and other investors.

### **Thought leaders**

  

CohnReznick is an active voice in the renewable energy industry at the
national and regional level. In addition to hosting our own Renewable Energy
Summit and Accounting Forum, we are regularly called upon as experts to speak
at events, offer insights, and contribute to publications. We work closely
with the following energy associations:

##

American Council on Renewable Energy

American Wind Energy Association

Solar Energy Industries Association

## Integrated solutions for renewable energy companies

CohnReznick’s integrated accounting, tax, and advisory capabilities serve
companies at every point of the renewable energy business spectrum.

### **Technical accounting consulting**

Complex transactions –especially those involving tax credits – require
specialized accounting. We consult with clients on the accounting treatment of
complex commodity contracts, align accounting policies as part of an
acquisition, and manage the impact of new or proposed accounting standards and
contemplated deal structures — including modeling the impact of HLBV at the
project, sponsor, and investor levels.

### **Tax and tax equity advisory**

For developers and investors, tax-planning strategies are the lynchpin of
renewable energy deals. We carefully assess tax and GAAP considerations for
potential deal structures, modeling tax and GAAP impact to both the project
and its sponsors.

##  Infrastructure advisory

Now is the time to start building your qualifications and capabilities to
maximize your potential to be awarded work on infrastructure projects. We can
help you identify and understand likely government award criteria and make the
operational changes necessary to strengthen your bids.­

Learn more about our infrastructure advisory services

Cookie Settings

We use cookies for many different site operations such as improving website
experiences, analytics, remembering preferences or settings, interest-based
advertising, and marketing. Some of these cookies transmit information to
third parties. Our Privacy Policy provides more information and choices about
cookies. By clicking “Accept All” you consent to our use of all cookies.

Cookie Settings ACCEPT ALL

## Privacy Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your
browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you,
your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as
you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but
it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your
right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on
the different category headings to find out more and change our default
settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience
of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
More information

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and
personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose
services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then
some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They
may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show
you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal
information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet
device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted
advertising.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

Strictly Necessary Cookies

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched
off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by
you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy
preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block
or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then
work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure
and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are
the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All
information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If
you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our
site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
